title: Replace landing page header branding with Butterfly Wellness wordmark

requirements.text:
Update the Landing page header to fully replace the SHAMMAH branding with the Butterfly Wellness main wordmark image only: (1) replace the existing header (XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[1]/div[1]/img[1]) to use the uploaded Butterfly Wellness wordmark image, and (2) remove the SHAMMAH

element entirely (XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[1]/div[1]/h1[1]).
acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx, the header no longer renders the text "SHAMMAH" (the <h1> element is removed).
The header shows only the Butterfly Wellness main wordmark logo image (use the uploaded wordmark image, not the BW icon).
The header logo has an appropriate alt text (e.g., "Butterfly Wellness") and the logo sizing preserves a clean header layout (no overflow or distortion).

requirements.text: Add the uploaded Butterfly Wellness wordmark image to the frontend as a static public asset and reference it from the Landing page header src. Use a filename and path that avoids spaces/special characters.

quotes: find the header file and please replace it with this image

acceptanceCriteria: A copy of the uploaded wordmark image (green bw logo.png) exists under frontend/public (recommended under frontend/public/assets/...).
The Landing page header src points to the new public asset path and loads correctly in the browser build without broken links.

constraints:
Apply changes ONLY to the selected header elements (the header logo and header

) on the landing page; do not make unrelated content changes.
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not redesign the rest of the landing page, hero copy, footer, or dashboard screens.
Do not change backend logic, data models, or authentication behavior.
